channel.title: dollywood on Virtualbeck's Blog

item.title: dollywood
item.description: Last week, our family went to Dollywood, in Pidgeon Forge, TN. It was a great time! I wanted to take some time to jot down my thoughts before they became just meatspace between the ears. Dollywood used to be a Silver Dollar City park, and evidently Dolly Parton wanted a stake in the venture. One stipulation was that I be temporarily renamed to ‘Dollywood’ the first year. Well, on the first opening day under the new name, attendance was double the average, and the name stuck.
